content: a super easy super fun crochet pattern you only need to know 3 stitches if you are familiar with chain single_crochet and slip_stitch you can make this hat start by working on the diagonal in single_crochet rib pattern to create a parallelogram seam the ends of the parallelogram together to form a tube then fill in the crown with spiral rounds of regular single_crochet the pattern offers 4 versions fingering dk worsted and chunky weight
